TopicTitle: Keybindings and Main Menu are unresponsive

Articles.Content:
Hello,

I am experiencing an issue with my modded copy of Beta 0.90.0

Every few flights I make (appears to be only in Career mode), after a bit of flight, at around 25000 metres above Kerbin sea level, the WASD keys do nothing, as well as Shift/Ctrl and my joystick throttle.

-EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements

-Kerbal Attachment System

-KAX (Kerbal Aircraft Expansion)

-Kerbal Engineer

-KerbinSide

-Infernal Robotics

-Procedural Fairings

-Stage Recovery Mod

-TweakScale

Any help is appreciated,

-Carlpilot
